00046 //
00047 //! complete l'iterateur et l'evaluateur
00048 void Op_Conv_Quick_VDF_Elem::associer(const Zone_dis& zone_dis,
00049                                       const Zone_Cl_dis& zone_cl_dis,
00050                                       const Champ_Inc& ch_transporte)
00051 {
00052   const Zone_VDF& zvdf = ref_cast(Zone_VDF,zone_dis.valeur());
00053   const Zone_Cl_VDF& zclvdf = ref_cast(Zone_Cl_VDF,zone_cl_dis.valeur());
00054   const Champ_P0_VDF& inco = ref_cast(Champ_P0_VDF,ch_transporte.valeur());
00055 
00056   iter.associer(zvdf, zclvdf, *this);
00057 
00058   Eval_Quick_VDF_Elem& eval_conv = (Eval_Quick_VDF_Elem&) iter.evaluateur();
00059   eval_conv.associer_zones(zvdf, zclvdf );          //!< Evaluateur_VDF::associer_zones
00060   eval_conv.associer_inconnue(inco );        //!< Eval_VDF_Elem::associer_inconnue
00061   if (Process::nproc()>1 && zvdf.zone().nb_joints() && zvdf.zone().joint(0).epaisseur()<2)
00062     {
00063       Cerr << "Overlapping width (given by larg_joint option) of  " << zvdf.zone().joint(0).epaisseur() << finl;
00064       Cerr << "is not enough for Quick scheme in VDF parallel calculation." << finl;
00065       Cerr << "Please, partition your mesh with an overlapping width of 2 with larg_joint option." << finl;
00066       Process::exit();
00067     }
00068 }
00069 
00070 const Champ_Inc_base& Op_Conv_Quick_VDF_Elem::vitesse() const
00071 {
00072   Eval_Quick_VDF_Elem& eval_conv = (Eval_Quick_VDF_Elem&) iter.evaluateur();
00073   return eval_conv.vitesse();
00074 }
00075 
00076 Champ_Inc_base& Op_Conv_Quick_VDF_Elem::vitesse()
00077 {
00078   Eval_Quick_VDF_Elem& eval_conv = (Eval_Quick_VDF_Elem&) iter.evaluateur();
00079   return eval_conv.vitesse();
00080 }
